text.0: as priest with solemn rites and adorations i worship heaven and earth the high and holy.
text.1: to them great parents of the gods have sages of ancient time singing assigned precedence.
text.2: with newest hymns set in the seat of order those the two parents born before all others.
text.3: come heaven and earth with the celestial people hither to us for strong is your protection.
text.4: yea heaven and earth ye hold in your possession full many a treasure for the liberal giver.
text.5: grant us that wealth which comes in free abundance preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
